text: niccayamāka nām jiṉkaḷiliruntum, maṉitarkaḷiliruntum anēkarai narakattiṟkeṉṟē paṭaittuḷḷōm; avarkaḷukku irutayaṅkaḷ irukkiṉṟaṉa - āṉāl avaṟṟaik koṇṭu avarkaḷ nalluṇarvu peṟa māṭṭārkaḷ; avarkaḷukkuk kaṇkaḷ uṇṭu; āṉāl, avaṟṟaik koṇṭu avarkaḷ (iṟaivaṉiṉ attāṭcikaḷaip) pārppatillai avarkaḷukkuk kātukaḷ uṇṭu. Āṉāl avaṟṟaik koṇṭu avarkaḷ (naṟpōtaṉaiyaik) kēṭkamāṭṭārkaḷ - ittakaiyōr kālnaṭaikaḷaip pōṉṟavarkaḷ. Illai! Avaṟṟai viṭavum vaḻi kēṭarkaḷ; ivarkaḷ tām (namvacaṉaṅkaḷai) alaṭciyam ceytavarkaḷāvārkaḷ
